summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2014 CHRYSLER 300. ON SEVERAL OCCASIONS, THE VEHICLE ACCELERATED INDEPENDENTLY. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO ROCKY TOP CHRYSLER JEEP DODGE (LOCATED AT 3315 WINFIELD DUNN PKWY, KODAK, TN 37764, TEL: 865-932-4144), BUT THE MECHANIC WAS UNABLE TO RETRIEVE A FAULT CODE. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE FAILURE RECURRED SIX TIMES. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS CONTACTED AND STATED THAT THE ONLY RECOURSE WOULD BE TO GO TO ARBITRATION. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 35,000.  ..UPDATED 08/22/17 *BF    *CN
